mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sort.mapper.SortPrfmncMapper.selectSortPrfmnc */ WC.APC_CD AS APC_CD , WC.WGHNO AS WGHNO , WC.WGH_YMD AS WGH_YMD , WC.VHCLNO AS VHCLNO , WC.WHOL_WGHT AS WHOL_WGHT , WC.EMPT_VHCL_WGHT AS EMPT_VHCL_WGHT , WC.RDCD_RT AS RDCD_RT , WC.RDCD_WGHT AS RDCD_WGHT , WC.WRHS_WGHT AS WRHS_WGHT , WC.RMRK AS RMRK , WC.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN FROM TB_WGH_PRFMNC_COM WC WHERE WC.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND WC.WGHNO = #{wghno}

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sort.mapper.SortPrfmncMapper.selectSortCnclList */ SP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SP.SORTNO AS SORTNO , SP.SORT_SN AS SORT_SN , SP.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD , SP.INPT_YMD AS INPT_YMD , SP.FCLT_CD AS FCLT_CD , SP.SORT_QNTT AS SORT_QNTT , SP.SORT_WGHT AS SORT_WGHT , SP.RMRK AS RMRK , SI.RPRS_PRDCR_CD AS RPRS_PRDCR_CD , SI.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , SI.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , SI.SPCFCT_CD AS SPCFCT_CD , SI.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , SI.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , SI.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , SI.INVNTR_QNTT AS INVNTR_QNTT , SI.INVNTR_WGHT AS INVNTR_WGHT , (SELECT MAX(X.PCKGNO) FROM TB_PCKG_INPT_PRFMNC X WHERE X.APC_CD = SI.APC_CD AND X.SORTNO = SI.SORTNO AND X.DEL_YN = 'N') AS NXT_PCKGNO
FROM TB_SORT_PRFMNC SP , TB_SORT_INVNTR SI WHERE SP.APC_CD = SI.APC_CD AND SP.SORTNO = SI.SORTNO AND SP.SORT_SN = SI.SORT_SN AND SP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SP.SORTNO = #{sortno} ORDER BY APC_CD, INPT_YMD, SORTNO, SORT_SN

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sort.mapper.SortPrfmncMapper.selectSortInptPrfmncList */
ROWNUM AS ROW_SEQ , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT ,
pt0.* , (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('WAREHOUSE_SE_CD', pt0.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS WAREHOUSE_SE_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_PRDCR_NM(pt0.PRDCR_CD, pt0.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS PRDCR_NM FROM ( SELECT SI.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SI.WRHSNO AS WRHSNO , SI.INPT_YMD AS INPT_YMD , SI.SORTNO AS SORTNO , SI.QNTT AS QNTT , SI.WGHT AS WGHT , RI.PLTNO AS PLTNO , RI.WRHS_YMD AS WRHS_YMD , RI.PRDCR_CD AS PRDCR_CD , RI.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , RI.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , RI.GDS_SE_CD AS GDS_SE_CD , RI.WRHS_SE_CD AS WRHS_SE_CD , RI.TRSPRT_SE_CD AS TRSPRT_SE_CD , RI.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD
FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC SI , TB_RAW_MTR_INVNTR RI WHERE SI.APC_CD = RI.APC_CD AND SI.WRHSNO = RI.WRHSNO AND SI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND RI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SI.APC_CD = #{apcCd}
AND SI.SORTNO = #{sortno}
ORDER BY APC_CD, INPT_YMD, SORTNO, WRHSNO ) pt0
OFFSET (#{currentPageNo} - 1) * #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.sort.mapper.SortPrfmncMapper.selectSortListBySortno */ pt0.* , (SELECT X.SORT_INPT_VL_TYPE FROM TB_APC_VRTY_CRTR X WHERE X.APC_CD = pt0.APC_CD AND X.ITEM_CD = pt0.ITEM_CD AND X.VRTY_CD = pt0.VRTY_CD) AS SORT_INPT_VL_TYPE , (SELECT X.INDCT_ARTCL_TYPE FROM TB_APC_VRTY_CRTR X WHERE X.APC_CD = pt0.APC_CD AND X.ITEM_CD = pt0.ITEM_CD AND X.VRTY_CD = pt0.VRTY_CD) AS INDCT_ARTCL_TYPE FROM ( SELECT A.APC_CD AS APC_CD , A.SORTNO AS SORTNO , MAX(A.INPT_YMD) AS INPT_YMD , MAX(A.FCLT_CD) AS FCLT_CD
, LISTAGG(A.GRD_NM || ': ' || TO_CHAR(A.SORT_QNTT, 'FM999,999') || ' ' || A.SPCFCT_NM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY A.SORT_SN) AS GRD_QNTT_NM , LISTAGG(A.GRD_CD || ':' || A.SORT_QNTT || ':' || A.SORT_WGHT || ':' || A.SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY A.SORT_SN) AS GRD_QNTT_WGHT , SUM(A.SORT_QNTT) AS SORT_QNTT , SUM(A.SORT_WGHT) AS SORT_WGHT , SUM(A.INVNTR_QNTT) AS INVNTR_QNTT , SUM(A.INVNTR_WGHT) AS INVNTR_WGHT
, MAX(A.RPRS_PRDCR_CD) AS RPRS_PRDCR_CD , MAX(A.ITEM_CD) AS ITEM_CD , MAX(A.VRTY_CD) AS VRTY_CD
, MAX(A.RPRS_PRDCR_NM) AS RPRS_PRDCR_NM , MAX(A.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM , MAX(A.VRTY_NM) AS VRTY_NM , MAX(A.SPCFCT_NM) AS SPCFCT_NM , MAX(A.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD) AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , TO_CHAR(MIN(A.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT), 'MM/DD HH24:MI') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , ( SELECT MAX(X.WRHSNO) FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC X WHERE X.APC_CD = A.APC_CD AND X.SORTNO = A.SORTNO AND X.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS WRHSNO , ( SELECT MAX(RI.PLTNO) FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC X JOIN TB_RAW_MTR_INVNTR RI ON RI.APC_CD = X.APC_CD AND RI.WRHSNO = X.WRHSNO WHERE X.APC_CD = A.APC_CD AND X.SORTNO = A.SORTNO AND X.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS PLTNO , ( SELECT SUM(X.QNTT) FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC X WHERE X.APC_CD = A.APC_CD AND X.SORTNO = A.SORTNO AND X.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS INPT_QNTT , ( SELECT SUM(X.WGHT) FROM TB_SORT_INPT_PRFMNC X WHERE X.APC_CD = A.APC_CD AND X.SORTNO = A.SORTNO AND X.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS INPT_WGHT FROM ( SELECT SP.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SP.SORTNO AS SORTNO , SP.SORT_SN AS SORT_SN , SP.GRD_CD AS GRD_CD , SP.INPT_YMD AS INPT_YMD , SP.FCLT_CD AS FCLT_CD , (SELECT FN_GET_STD_GRD_SORT(SP.APC_CD, SP.SORTNO, SP.SORT_SN, 'S_NM') FROM DUAL) AS GRD_NM , SP.SORT_QNTT AS SORT_QNTT , SP.SORT_WGHT AS SORT_WGHT , SI.RPRS_PRDCR_CD AS RPRS_PRDCR_CD , SI.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , SI.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , SI.SPCFCT_CD AS SPCFCT_CD , SI.PCKG_YN AS PCKG_YN , SI.SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD AS SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD , SI.WAREHOUSE_SE_CD AS WAREHOUSE_SE_CD , SI.INVNTR_QNTT AS INVNTR_QNTT , SI.INVNTR_WGHT AS INVNTR_WGHT , SI.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , (SELECT FN_GET_PRDCR_NM(SI.RPRS_PRDCR_CD, SI.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS RPRS_PRDCR_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_ITEM_NM(SI.ITEM_CD, SI.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_VRTY_NM(SI.ITEM_CD, SI.VRTY_CD, SI.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS VRTY_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_SPCFCT_NM(SI.ITEM_CD, SI.SPCFCT_CD, SI.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS SPCFCT_NM , (SELECT FN_GET_SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_NM(SI.SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD, SI.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_NM
FROM TB_SORT_PRFMNC SP , TB_SORT_INVNTR SI
WHERE SP.APC_CD = SI.APC_CD AND SP.SORTNO = SI.SORTNO AND SP.SORT_SN = SI.SORT_SN AND SP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SI.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SP.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SP.INPT_YMD = #{sortYmd} ) A
GROUP BY A.APC_CD, A.SORTNO
ORDER BY INPT_YMD DESC, SORTNO DESC ) pt0 FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY
